text: Anthonius Hubertus "Bart" Carlier (23 June 1929 â€“ 4 May 2017) was a Dutch football player. He played eight seasons in France, winning league championships with AS Monaco in 1961 and 1963. Carlier appeared for the Dutch national team five times, scoring two goals. Carlier died on 4 May 2017 in Strasbourg, France, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at Netherlands federation official site *Voetbalstats.nl *weltfussball.de Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:People from Venlo Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Netherlands)
title: Bart Carlier
